desc: Home of the softest, most huggable handmade knitted blankets, throws and other products for you, your baby and your home.

layout.text:
Welcome to Snugabug. The home of the softest most huggable handmade to order blankets, throws, bed runners and other knitted products  for you, your baby and your home. 
Each item is lovingly handmade using magically soft yarn.
